title: Russia Is Interfering in the Election Now by All Accounts: Fmr. Mueller Lead Prosecutor // Cooley // Global Law Firm
text: Russia Is Interfering in the Election Now by All Accounts: Fmr. Mueller Lead Prosecutor Andrew Goldstein, Cooley partner and head of the firm’s white collar defense and investigations group, appeared on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe” to discuss “Interference: The Inside Story of Trump, Russia, and the Mueller Investigation,” a book he co-authored with Aaron Zebley and James Quarles about the Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.
